title: Giro d'Italia Highlights
overview: Daily highlights of Giro d'Italia on Quest every day at 10pm. Giro d'Italia is one of the most important races for a cyclist, and will see elite athletes from all over the world competing, and for the first time Quest will be showing action-packed highlights from each day's racing. The race will include six sprint stages, eight stages of medium difficulty climbing, five highly testing climbing stages and two individual time trials (for a total of 67.2km) including the stage that will close the 100th Giro, from the famous Monza racetrack to the Milan Cathedral.
